name: Dr. Princy Randhawa
title: Associate Professor | Ex-Assistant Director- Alumni Relations | IEEE (Senior Member) | Social Activist | Mrs. India Pride of Nation Finalist 2017
bio: Dr. Princy Randhawa is a passionate Machine learning/ AI researcher and educator with over 12 years of experience in teaching and industry. She is an Associate Professor at Dayanand Sagar University and worked in Manipal University Jaipur for 10 years in mechatronics engg. dept. She conducts research and teaches courses on control systems, machine learning, IoT and Data analytics. She holds a PhD in machine learning in wearable technology and has published more than 50 papers in international journals and conferences, including 14 papers in SCI journals with 7 in Q1 category. Dr. Randhawa was also an Assistant Director of Alumni Relations and a leader of various academic and administrative initiatives at Manipal University Jaipur. She was the admission coordinator, the M.Tech program co-coordinator, the nodal officer of 5 MoUs, the department alumni coordinator, the faculty advisor of the ISA chapter, the industry connect coordinator, the department international coordinator, and the social media coordinator. She is a professional member of ISA and IEEE (Senior Member), and a social activist who has organized cancer awareness and women's sanitation hygiene programs in rural colleges. She is passionate about applying artificial intelligence for women's safety and empowerment.
